speaker: President.
english: President. – The next item is the report by Mr Langen on behalf of the Committee on Economic and Monetary Affairs on the enlargement of the euro zone [ 2006/2103(INI) ] ( A6-0191/2006 ).
original: President. – The next item is the report by Mr Langen on behalf of the Committee on Economic and Monetary Affairs on the enlargement of the euro zone [ 2006/2103(INI) ] ( A6-0191/2006 ).
